page.title: 12RECREATION-VILLAGE HALLS
page.content: {VILLAGE HALLS} THERE ARE TWO VILLAGE HALLS IN GOLDSITHNEY AND A COMMUNITY CENTRE IN MARAZION. {THE COMMUNITY CENTRE}WAS BUILT IN 1983 IT SUPPORTS A VARIETY OF ACTIVITIES INCLUDING AN AMATEUR DRAMATIC SOCIETY AND PROVIDES CLUB FACILITIES FOR OUTDOOR SPORTS SUCH AS FOOTBALL. {ST.PIRANS HALL}AT GOLDSITHNEY WAS BUILT IN 1973 AND IS USED MAINLY BY INDOOR GAMES CLUBS. THERE IS A THRIVING DANCE CLUB AND CHILDRENS PLAYGROUP.THE HALL IS ALSO USED BY LOCAL PEOPLE FOR PARTIES AND WEDDING RECEPTIONS ETC. AND THE GY. HORTICULTURAL SOCIETY SHOW IS HELD THERE. THE SMALLER{ST.JAMES HALL}IN GOLDSITHNEY IS USED PRIMARILY BY THE YOUTH CLUB,THE GOLDEN AGE AND THE WOMENS INSTITUTE.
